description: UTC timestamp when this row of data was collected
Unique asset ID from CoinGecko (e.g., bitcoin, ethereum)
Current market price of the coin in USD
Percentage change in price over the last 24 hours
Total trading volume in USD over the last 24 hours
Current total market capitalization of the coin in USD
14-period Relative Strength Index computed from intraday data
Rolling 14-period standard deviation of percentage returns
20-period Simple Moving Average of the coin's price
Search interest score for the keyword 'Bitcoin' over the last 4 hours
Search interest score for the keyword 'Ethereum' over the last 4 hours
Crypto market sentiment index (0 = extreme fear, 100 = extreme greed)
Average VADER compound sentiment score of top posts in r/CryptoCurrency (last hour)
Price proxy for the S&P 500 index (using SPY ETF)
Price proxy for gold (using GLD ETF)
Simple USD index calculated as (1 / USD-to-EUR exchange rate) * 100
